entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:44 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 03:50 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
